name: matcha
description: Tweet, save  and make stats of every song listened on spotify
author: Ana√Øs Derue <hello@anaisderue.com>

scripts.start: dotenv npm run migrate up && dotenv node src/matcha.js
scripts.start:local: dotenv -c -- npm run migrate up && dotenv -c  -- node src/matcha.js
scripts.start:local:watch: dotenv -c -- npm run migrate up && dotenv -c  -- nodemon src/matcha.js
